channel.title: Changing teleport coordinates on the mage book, Please Help!
channel.description: Hello, I have been searching forever, and can't find out how to change the coordinates that the spells teleport you to when you click on it in the mage book. I am using a 317 source. Please help.

item.title: Changing teleport coordinates on the mage book, Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

We need to know the base. Also, just in case if anyone searches this, doing the right thing, I’m going to post what to do in a

Project Insanity base. First go onto your server and type ::dataon and then teleport to home. The ::dataon tells you the

coordinates you’re at, so search the first numbers in that(The X Coordinates) in the config.java, and you’ll see the home teleport

coordinates. Now you’re going to go anywhere you want the home to be(while you still have ::dataon active) and put the X and

Y coordinates in where the old home coordinates were. Now teleport home and see if it works. To change where starting

players spawn, while still in config.java just search

and you can either put in the home coordinates or somewhere else you want. Now to change where people go when they die.

STILL in config.java search for

and again you can put the home coordinates there or somewhere else you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing teleport coordinates on the mage book, Please Help!
